description.value:
Defines the name of data slice in DCE where the data from `value` will be propagated on `change` or by `slice-event` event

On: any component with `value` and associated change event

Defines the event name on which `value` would be synchronized with DCE slice

On: any component with `value` and associated change event
XPath expression to return either boolean or error string to be shown by browser native UI on form validation event. Unless value is true, prevents the form submission.
XPath expression to populate into the slice

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: hides DCE definition to prevent visual appearance of content. Wrap the payload into template tag to prevent applying the inline CSS in global scope.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: HTML tag for Custom Element. Used for window.customElements.define(). If not set, would be generated and DCE instance rendered inline.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: full, relative, or hash URL to DCE template

tags.name: for-each
tags.description: The <xsl:for-each> element selects a set of nodes and processes each of them in the same way. It is often used to iterate through a set of nodes or to change the current node. If one or more <xsl:sort> elements appear as the children of this element, sorting occurs before processing. Otherwise, nodes are processed in document order.

attributes.name: select
attributes.description: Uses an XPath expression to select nodes to be processed.

tags.name: slice
tags.description: Synthetic element for defining the slice-attributed when more then one slice/event/value associated with parent element

tags.name: location-element
tags.description: get/set window URL parts or from SRC URL

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: url to be parsed. When omitted window.location is used.

attributes.name: live
attributes.description: monitors history change, applicable only when href is omitted.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: when defined, changes URL by one of predefined methods.

tags.name: module-url
tags.description: get module URL into slice from SRC according to web page importmap

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: path to module resource, If omitted, it would match the window.location.href

attributes.name: slice
attributes.description: slice name where resolved URL would be propagated

tags.name: http-request
tags.description: Fetches data from a URL and exposes request, response, and parsed data via the value property. Supports JSON and XML response parsing.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: The URL to fetch data from. When changed, triggers a new fetch request.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: HTTP method for the request (GET, POST, etc.)

attributes.name: header-accept
attributes.description: Sets the Accept header for the request. Use header-* pattern for other headers.

attributes.name: slice
attributes.description: slice name where the fetched data would be propagated

tags.name: local-storage
tags.description: Provides access to localStorage with reactive updates. Reads and writes values to localStorage by key.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Value type: text, json, or input types (number, date). Defaults to text.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Initial value to set in localStorage. If omitted, reads existing value.

attributes.name: live
attributes.description: When present, monitors localStorage changes and updates reactively

attributes.name: slice
attributes.description: slice name where the localStorage value would be propagated
